author: Andrew Orr
title: Apple approves 'SaruTobi' game for iOS with cryptocurrency in-app purchases
description: Apple has approved SaruTobi's return to the App Store, featuring integrated Bitcoin Lightning payments for in-game extras.Apple approves crypto gameSaruTobi, developed by Christian Moss and published by MandelDuck, is now available on the App Store with ZBD-p…
content:
Apple has approved SaruTobi's return to the App Store, featuring integrated Bitcoin Lightning payments for in-game extras.
